      • clone

        public ProbedImpl clone()
        Description copied from interface: Notifier
        Creates a clone of this Notifier.

        The clone will contain a new empty listeners list and is independent from this object.

        Specified by:

      • addProbe

        public Probe<?> addProbe(Probe<?> probe)
        Description copied from interface: Probed
        Adds the given probe and returns null, and if there is already an existing probe with the same Key as the probe being added then returns the old probe.

        If there was already another probe with the same Key (see Probe.getKey()) as the probe being added, then this probe will replace that probe.

        The added probe is setup if it was not. And, the replaced probe is discarded.

        Specified by:
        addProbe in interface Probed
        Returns:
        null or the old probe (ie: the probe that was replaced)

      • getProbe

        public final Probe<?> getProbe(String probeKey)
        Description copied from interface: Probed
        This method is an alias for getProbe(probeKey, true).
        Specified by:
        getProbe in interface Probed

      • getProbe

        public Probe<?> getProbe(String probeKey,
                boolean create)
        Description copied from interface: Probed
        Returns an existing probe matching the given probeKey, a newly created probe or null.

        This method first searches for a probe that matches the given probeKey and returns it if found.

        Then if no such probe is found and create is true, then a new probe is created based on the given probeKey and current configuration. The newly created probe is returned and is also added to the list of probes inside this probed object (ie: it is added to the list returned by Probed.getProbes().

        If the create parameter is false, then null is returned.

        Specified by:
        getProbe in interface Probed
        create - whether to create a probe with the given probeKey if none is found
        Returns:
        an existing probe matching the given probeKey, a newly created probe or null

      • getProbes

        Description copied from interface: Probed
        Returns an unmodifiable collection containing all probes in this object.

      • removeProbe

        public Probe<?> removeProbe(String probeKey)
        Description copied from interface: Probed
        Removes the probe whose key is equal the given probeKey if it exists and returns it.

        The removed probe is discarded.

        Specified by:
        removeProbe in interface Probed
        Returns:
        the removed probe
